price: E, com efeito, concedemos a Moisés o Livro e fizemos de seu irmão Aarão, vizir, assistente, junto dele.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wajaʿalnā maʿahu akhāhu hārūna wazīran
